bug.author: lluunn
bug.summary: kfctl install istio fails with GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS
bug.description:
Just like what we do in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/blob/master/testing/kfctl/kfctl_go_test.py>test</denchmark-link> :
use GOOGLE_APPLICATIOB_CREDENTIALS to point to a service account gcloud activate that set email to that service account
Installing istio failed to create clusterrole. However, there is already a binding for service account and cluster admin. Maybe it's because when installing istio we get another identity / wrong way getting credential?
